markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Briar Battler](/Feats.aspx?ID=2385) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've learned to use roots, crevices, uneven ground, and dense underbrush to your advantage. When you're in difficult terrain from an environmental feature, you can [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90), even if the feature wouldn't ordinarily be large enough for you to Take Cover.
name: Briar Battler
